attributes.review: So, I support my president. I wanted to do something special for him, because he respects everyone. When I downloaded the app it asked for my number. Iâ€™m a HUGE Trump supporter, so I put it in. It asked other information, and I dumbly put it in. Might I add, it was very glitchy, and very hard to navigate through the app. Plus, there were lots of grammatical errors. I know Trump is very educated, and wouldnâ€™t promote grammatically incorrect apps. Anyway, it was 3 am in the morning, when I started getting calls, and messages. â€œWho can these be from?â€ I thought. I accepted a call, and a man said in a raspy voice â€œHello, Iâ€™m a Trumpie like you, I can come to your house so we can work on Trump 2020 signs?â€ I then heard a knock at the door. It was the same guy, AT MY HOUSE! I told him to get out of my property, and Iâ€™ll call the police. He said â€œBut dearie, we have to work on our signs!â€ â€œI love Trump, but itâ€™s 3 am, and I drank a lot of bleach yesterday.â€ I said trying to convince him. He finally left, so I decided to read the messages. They read, â€œTrump; the world greatest president may drop out of the election.â€ I was devastated! To make it worse, the next day someone left me a voicemail, it said â€œHey, so I saw youâ€™re on that Trump 2020 app. So, Iâ€™ll egg your house, and put Biden 2020 signs everywhere. This made my blood boil, Trump is great! Unfortunately, I had no choice but to delete the app. Itâ€™s been about a week since I deleted it, yet I still get all these calls and messages from fellow Trumpies. Absolutely disgusting, I expected better service..
attributes.title: SPAMS INBOX DONâ€™T DOWNLOAD
